title: Why I Make Beats Like This
excerpt: How cinematic emotion, gritty textures and VHS vibes blend into my sound.
content: I always loved how films made me feel something real. My goal with every beat is to capture that emotion. That's why I lean on ambient textures, glitchy transitions, and minimal arrangements.

title: What Inspires My Sound
excerpt: From 40 Shebib to J Dilla, here’s what shaped the way I produce.
content: Artists like Noah '40' Shebib taught me the power of space and restraint. Less can really be more. J Dilla showed me that swing is everything. It’s not about being perfect, it’s about being human.
